page.title: 06MORE AMENITIES IN EARDISLEY
page.content: There are two groups of{doctors serving the area,one practice from Kington and one from Weobley/Staunton. The Kington practice have a{surgery}in the village which dispenses medicines for patients and holds a surgery most days.The Weobley practice have a surgery once a week in a private house If you have a small accident it can be dealt with at Kington Cottage{hospital but fractures and more serious accidents have to dealt with in Hereford 15 miles away. Eardisley is well served for{shops.}It has a hairdressers,a newsagents,a butchers,a laundrette,an antique shop,two general stores and a bank. They are mostly family businesses and are open 6 days a week from 9.00-6.00 Most customers are local except in the antique shop.There are 2 inns in the village which offer accommodation.
